title: Phishing Email Detected - Credential Harvest Attempt
details: Phishing email detected attempting credential harvesting. Email spoofs legitimate Google login page and requests user credentials. Contains malicious links to attacker-controlled domain (polarpak.ca) with high domain similarity to Google services. Target user: Doris Moreno (doris_moreno), Legal Department. Email originating from spoofed Google address with high phishing confidence score.
email_subject: Verify your Google Account - Immediate Action Required
